definitions.text: the activity of protecting someone or something
a covering that is intend to protect from damage or injury
examples: they had no protection from the fallout
wax provided protection for the floors

definitions.text: defense against financial failure; financial independence
examples: his pension gave him security in his old age
insurance provided protection against loss of wages due to illness
they were huddled together for protection
he enjoyed a sense of peace and protection in his new home
the tournament was held under the auspices of the city council

definitions.text: the imposition of duties or quotas on imports in order to protect domestic industry against foreign competition
examples: he made trade protection a plank in the party platform

definitions.text: payment extorted by gangsters on threat of violence
examples: every store in the neighborhood had to pay him protection
